item.title: BOLD: Boolean Logic Deep Learning
item.description: Boolean Logic Deep Learning (BOLD) revolutionizes deep learning by enabling training with Boolean weights and activations, achieving state-of-the-art accuracy with drastically reduced energy consumpti…
